snippet: The Huskies improved to 19-7 and 9-4 in the American Athletic Conference by handing Southern Methodist its fourth loss in seven games since an 18-0 start.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; University of Connecticut beats Southern Methodist, 68-62, other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Huskies improved to 19-7 and 9-4 in the American Athletic Conference by handing Southern Methodist its fourth loss in seven games since an 18-0 start.

headline.main: Connecticut Knocks Off No. 21 S.M.U. For 19th Win
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Knocks Off No. 21 S.M.U. for 19th Win
